name: 4.9 "From Beer to Eternity" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 4 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What did Cliff have that was new in the cold opening?
questions.explanation:
sunglasses.

	Cliff came in talking about how bright it was but how he was lucky to have his sunglasses. The glasses gave Cliff some more encouragement to approach a beautiful woman.

questions.text: Who won the baseball game between Cheers and Gary's Olde Towne Tavern?
questions.explanation:
Gary's Olde Towne Tavern.

	Gary came to the bar to rub their noses in the fact that they lost. He said however that he came in the spirit of sportsmanship.

questions.text: What kind of bar did Sam say Cheers is?
questions.explanation:
jock bar.

	Sam was afraid that if Cheers lost every sport to Gary's he would lose his clientele.  There was a concern that everyone would go to Gary's where the "real" jocks were.

questions.text: Who played Gary in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Joel Polis.

	Polis started is career as Fuchs in the movie "The Thing". He has done Broadway as well as movies and tv appearances.

questions.text: What sport did Cheers challenge Gary's Olde Towne Tavern at?
questions.explanation:
bowling.

	Carla said the other sports required great athletic talent. Bowling however is played by overweight people.

questions.text: Why didn't Woody want to play the sport with the guys?
questions.correct: He once maimed a man while playing.
options: It brings back memories of his mother.
questions.explanation:
He once maimed a man while playing.

	Everyone tried to convince him to play but he refused. He said it was "an innocence maintenance man". The ten-pin hit him between the eyes.

"Let's try not to embarrass ourselves."

	Sam was expecting to lose so he didn't have much of a pep talk. They figured their only chance was Woody and he refused to play.

No.

	He went to the bowling alley and tried to play. However, he froze up with the ball in his hand.

questions.text: When Sam asked Cliff how they were doing how did Cliff respond?
questions.explanation:
Sinking like a stone.

	They were behind from the start and it didn't look good for them at all. When Woody came to play, he replaced Cliff who pretended he sprained his wrist.

questions.text: Who ended up playing the sport?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane took bowling in college to fulfill the GE requirement. As a result she was quite good at bowling.
